imdb.plot outline: In this recreation of 2017's NightFall, 2 friends move into a house together but something is wrong. Devin (Devin M.) believes there is a murderer but his best friend does not. Devin starts to believe that his own best friend is the one causing him all of this anxiety and decide to attack. He gets sent to jail and returns one year later.
imdb.title: NightFall: Reborn
plot: This show is a reboot of NightFall (2017) tackling similar mysteries and drama.::Devin M.

In this recreation of 2017's NightFall, 2 friends move into a house together but something is wrong. Devin (Devin M.) believes there is a murderer but his best friend does not. Devin starts to believe that his own best friend is the one causing him all of this anxiety and decide to attack. He gets sent to jail and returns one year later.::Devin M.
